title: Formative Assessment and AI-Integrated Instructional Design to Strengthen Self-Directed Learning Competencies of Pre-Service Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics pedagogy and understanding of metacognitive strategies
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment that supports formative assessment and self-directed learning with AI-based tools in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology setting

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can apply metacognitive strategies with over 80% accuracy when designing mathematics instruction using a formative assessment model
Learners achieve over 90% of weekly learning objectives through an AI-based feedback system while strengthening self-assessment competencies
Participants successfully generate three or more instances of self-directed problem-solving in student role simulations via VR simulation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
